revision.text: {{sbarinfo|[flags, ..., ] <chainimage>, <gemimage>, <leftpadding>, <rightpadding>, <chainsize>, <x>, <y>}} Draws a ''[[Heretic]]''-style life gem. The gem can move anywhere on the {{c|chainimage}} unless paddings are specified. The chain will shift a maximum of {{c|chainsize}} pixels to the right while the gem is moving. Flags are: ;wiggle:Enable ''Heretic''-style wiggling. ;translatable:Add player color translations to the gem image. ;armor:Changes the value represented from health to armor. ;reverse:Reverses the direction of the gem. ;interpolate(<speed>):Interpolates the value drawn.
